JobFullDesc: Facebook is looking for a Public Policy Manager, E-Commerce to join the Global Public Policy Team. The Team’s mission is to lead Facebook’s engagement with policymakers around the world. This person will support the Economic Policy team, and work closely with the company’s Legal, Partnership, and wider Policy teams and advise Facebook product teams on public policy matters related to e-commerce to amplify the benefits that technology brings to commerce, trade, and economic empowerment.In this role, you will assist in the formulation and implementation of the company’s global e-commerce public policy strategy. This role will also monitor and analyze electronic commerce policy trends for the company and relevant stakeholders. This role will assist in advising Facebook's internal teams on our public policy strategy to help guide the development of products and services. Additionally, the Public Policy Manager will aid in the development of Facebook's positions in public presentations or closed-door policy briefings.Candidates should be dedicated, detail-oriented, creative, resourceful, analytical, and knowledgeable about emerging e-commerce issues, and have strong presentation and organizational skills. Candidates should also be comfortable meeting high expectations under quick deadlines and prepared to lead, direct and execute in order to get work done well and fast.
